node.title: Remote WA town steamrolled by media attention as Cleo Smith rescued
node.alt: A man in a suit surrounded by media.
node.description: Usually the small, banana-growing town of Carnarvon is barely worth a pit stop on the 15-hour drive from Perth to the glorious Ningaloo Reef, but the miraculous discovery of little Cleo Smith suddenly attracted the attention of the whole world.
node.content:
["For a sleepy beach town of 5,000 people, it was three weeks in the eye of a storm.", "The visceral shock of a vulnerable little girl just disappearing in the night resonated around the world.", "Police, SES, support workers and the media descended on the town of Carnarvon \u2014\u00a0a remote, windswept place about 800 kilometres north of Perth \u2014\u00a0in the desperate hunt for a missing child.", "In those first two weeks, a dark cloud hung over the town as the days stretched out and hopes began to wane.", "From the moment she was reported missing from her family\u2019s tent at the Blowholes campground, pieces of the puzzle began to emerge that pointed to something ominous.", "", "
The site at the Blowholes campground\u00a0where Cleo Smith's family tent was pitched.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "The unaccounted-for car spotted leaving the car park around 3am. The tent's\u00a0zip being undone to a height\u00a0too tall for the four-year-old to have reached. Her\u00a0sleeping bag also missing.", "Exactly how police put the\u00a0puzzle together remains unclear.", "But we know that by late Tuesday, they had enough information to zero in on one house in the suburb of Brockman, an area some locals consider a rough part of town.", "Residents of that street heard banging in the night.", "They and the rest of the world woke to the miraculous announcement that in the very early hours of Wednesday morning she had been found alive.", "Those residents shared their shock and horror as it dawned on them how close they had been to the little girl everyone had been trying to find.", "
Emotion turns from fear to joy\u00a0
", "Walking through town in those frantic 48 hours after her discovery, overheard snatches of conversation were all about Cleo.", "Residents spoke in wonder of the moment she was found by police, after they kicked down a door.", "People\u2019s voices would waver\u00a0as bits and pieces of information about that moment came to light.", "The hero police officer who scooped her up.", "The moment she told Detective Senior Sergeant Cameron Blaine her name.", "", "
An audio recording of the moment officers found Cleo in the house.
", "The audio recorded by a police body-worn camera that captured that moment was later released by police and played over the radio in the local bakery.", "A woman working behind the counter clapped her hand over her mouth,\u00a0overcome with emotion.", "", "
A timeline of events leading to Cleo Smith's rescue.
", "In the aftermath of Cleo's\u00a0recovery, emotions ran high in Carnarvon, uniting the town in its collective relief.", "But as well as those moments of elation, there were times when the residents must have also shaken their collective heads.", "
Tipping point into prurience
", "When the WA Premier came to town on Thursday, he wanted to meet with Cleo\u2019s family and take her a teddy bear.", "It was a sweet moment but it also meant the media descended on a house on a suburban street where the family were with Cleo, just a little over 24 hours after her return.", "Likely it was the home of friends or family, with a neat front lawn which ended up trampled by the media pack waiting for the Premier to emerge, hopeful for a glimpse of Cleo or her parents.", "Cleo\u2019s family late yesterday sent out a statement profusely thanking everyone, particularly the WA police, for finding their little girl.", "But importantly, they\u00a0also asked for privacy.", "Being the centre of media scrutiny is not something they ever asked for.", "Journalists play an important role in these events. We need to get information out to the public, to make people alert for clues.", "We also need to inform the community of these types of events, so they can be alert and aware.", "But there comes a tipping point when the public interest in the story can tip into prurience.", "This is a family that has endured, and survived, something horrific and almost unspeakable.", "They, along with their friends and family in Carnarvon, deserve to have their wishes respected going forward.", "Carnarvon will likely never be the same after this. But community members will be hoping they and Cleo\u2019s family will be given the space to recover and move forward, and welcome Cleo back to her daily life with open arms.", "", "
Residents of Carnarvon, along with Cleo Smith's family,\u00a0will be hoping they are\u00a0afforded space to recover and move forward.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
"]
